articles.author: Rebecca Rubin
articles.title: ‘The Hunger Games’ Stage Adaptation to Open in London in 2024 - Variety
articles.description: A stage version of 'The Hunger Games' will open in London in 2024.
articles.content: London is volunteering as tribute to host the first-ever stage adaptation of “The Hunger Games,” a play based on Suzan Collins’ best-selling books and the Jennifer Lawrence-led blockbuster film franc… [+3008 chars]
